Details:
	The project aims at recruitment of experienced professionals in TCS by registering online on the Global Recruitment System application. It spreads across 19 countries and encapsulates the whole process from registration to hiring of the candidate through a single application including online interview assessments, resume shortlisting, offer letter generation, etc.

The application uses front-end technologies like javascript, angular JS, JSF etc. to capture the data of candidate and then based on the logics implemented at database level using PL/SQL coding the status of the candidate progresses until the joining of the candidate. It involves various cross application interfaces (real time and batch) for maintaining the same data across other applications during the process including Global DB.
